page.title: 17HUTTON MARR SCHOOL-1985 ROLL
page.content:
As this is probably the last ever record to be made by 'Hutton Marr School' we consider it of value that you, in the future, should know who we were, and where we were sent when our school closed. {TO PENRITH (SECONDARY)}Caroline Jerram,Christopher Rudd, Steven Waite.
{TO CALTHWAITE (PRIMARY)}Jonathan Brown, Graham Dickinson, Michael Dickinson, Jennifer Donald, Ian Holliday, Margaret Horn, Richard Jerram, Andrew McCreadie, William McCreadie, Geoffrey Rudd, David Wharton.
{TO PLUMPTON (PRIMARY)}Aaron Dickinson, Duane Dickinson, Helen Holmes, Joanne Holmes.
